description: TDD progress log tracking RED-GREEN cycles

tests.description: toggleFlag should flag an unflagged cell
tests.notes: Already green - toggleFlag implemented in previous test

tests.description: toggleFlag should unflag a flagged cell
tests.notes: Already green - toggleFlag already toggles correctly

tests.description: toggleFlag should not flag a revealed cell
tests.notes: Added isRevealed check to toggleFlag method

tests.description: setMine should mark cell as a mine
setAdjacentMines should set the adjacent mine count
tests.notes: Added setAdjacentMines method - Cell class complete!

tests.description: should create a board with specified rows and cols
tests.notes: Board class created with rows and cols properties

tests.description: should initialize a grid of cells
should populate grid with Cell instances
tests.notes: Updated _initializeGrid to create Cell instances with correct row/col

tests.description: getCell should return cell at given position
tests.notes: Added getCell method to retrieve cell by row and col

tests.description: getCell should return null for out-of-bounds position
tests.notes: Added bounds checking to getCell method

tests.description: getNeighbors should return 8 neighbors for center cell
tests.notes: Implemented getNeighbors method to find all 8 adjacent cells

tests.description: getNeighbors should return 3 neighbors for corner cell
tests.notes: Already green - getNeighbors correctly filters out-of-bounds cells

tests.description: placeMines should place correct number of mines
tests.notes: Implemented random mine placement with duplicate prevention
Implemented adjacent mine calculation using getNeighbors and filter - Board class core complete!

tests.description: revealCell should reveal a non-mine cell
tests.notes: Added revealCell method that calls cell.reveal()

tests.description: revealCell should trigger flood-fill for empty cells with 0 adjacent mines
tests.notes: Implemented recursive flood-fill algorithm for cells with 0 adjacent mines

tests.description: isGameWon should return true when all non-mine cells are revealed
tests.notes: Implemented win condition check - iterates all cells to verify non-mines are revealed
